channel.title: Info On The Fally Massacre
channel.description: Ok Sence People Wanna Know Ok A Guy Named chan had a levl 99 contuction party and there was people fighting in the fighting ring (Durial Included) And He Booted Every Body Out And Durial Discovred That He Chould Attack People The Massacre ended I Think In Edge Vill

item.title: Info On The Fally Massacre
item.dc:creator: @jason_x jason_x
item.description:
@jason_x wrote:

[quote=“teh dew, post:11, topic:83322”][quote author=thenoob link=topic=122427.msg1198789#msg1198789 date=1177267295]
Well , ur description sucks , An Mod Durial321 ? had the power to attack everyone after he came out of the construction dueling ring , they could not fight back , He killed 100 of phat sellers and becamse the richest man in Rs , he got banned the same day but gave all his phats away to a friend ,
[/quote]
He said during a interview, that he only pked 1 party hat. That was a green one, and the person he pked it from quit rs.(obviously)[/quote]

Where did you even see or hear of an interview?

Read full topic

item.title: Info On The Fally Massacre
item.dc:creator: @YourDistracted YourDistracted
item.description:
@YourDistracted wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:15, topic:83322”][quote author=jat1801 link=topic=122427.msg1198042#msg1198042 date=1177254967]
Ok Sence People Wanna Know
Ok A Guy Named chan had a levl 99 contuction party
and there was people fighting in the fighting ring (Durial Included)
And He Booted Every Body Out
And Durial Discovred
That He Chould Attack People The Massacre ended I Think In Edge Vill
[/quote]
Chan wtf? You retard, it was Cursed You and Durial wasn’t the only one with the power to kill others, about 3 other people had it also but they didn’t do as much damage as he did. L2type and don’t start every word capitalized.[/quote]
l2type? Wow nice one you dumb hypocrite.

Read full topic

item.title: Info On The Fally Massacre
item.dc:creator: @jason_x jason_x
item.description:
@jason_x wrote:

Hey I think this was an interesting event xonsidering how he didnt care like most people if he got banned or not. He did what I wanted I mean I’ve felt like going on killing rampage through fally and edgeville so while many dont care I think its interesting.

Read full topic

But really, why did I give a shit?
